description:
You are invited to experience a picture-perfect escape at WelcomHeritage Shivavilas Palace Sandur (near Hampi), a former king's palace set in the mining hub of Sandur, Karnataka. An hour from the state's famous UNESCO World-Heritage listed town, Hampi, and under six hours from Bengaluru, this majestic property is now a heritage hotel offering a mesmerising dose of history, arts, culture and culinary fare - and easy access to the region's famous attractions, including the ruined temple complexes from the Vijayanagara Empire.

title: Sandur Palatial Escape near Hampi with Daily Breakfast, One Lunch/Dinner & Heritage Experiences
description:
Immerse yourself in royal grandeur at WelcomHeritage Shivavilas Palace Sandur, a regal sanctuary nestled in the heart of North Karnataka's Vijayanagara district. This palatial retreat, steeped in history and culture, offers a unique blend of luxury and heritage and is only a 30-minute drive from Jindal Vijaynagar Airport (VDY) and an hour's drive from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed town of Hampi. A former king's palace, this sprawling 22-acre property is now a heritage hotel waiting to be explored and experienced, a 5.5-hour drive from Bengaluru. Indulge in a gastronomic journey at the hotel's multiple restaurants, go for a swim in the pool, take a tour of the vintage car museum, or take a leisurely stroll through the palace gardens, and you'll be left mesmerised.

Journey back in time and savour the taste of India's glorious regal past as you will be treated like royalty within this beautifully restored oasis which hides within its bejewelled walls the legacy of the Ghorpade family. Lying close to the ruined temples of Hampi, the property is ideal for exploring the historical Vijayanagara region, while basking in utmost luxury and comfort.

An hour from the state's famous heritage town, Hampi, and less than six hours from Bengaluru, this majestic property is now a heritage hotel offering a mesmerising dose of history, arts, culture and culinary fare - and easy access to the region's famous attractions.
